An enclave guard guards the Ogre Enclave dungeon in the heart of Gu'Tanoth. During the Watchtower quest, players must use a nightshade on the enclave guard, which will start a short dialogue and then allow players to get through. After the quest a nightshade does not have to be used to enter the cave, but instead entering the cave will grant players the following message: A nearby guard looks at you suspiciously... You run past while they are thinking.

Enclave guards are an alternative to regular ogres for slayer tasks, as they give 20 more slayer experience than a regular ogre, but hit harder and attack much faster, as well as having many more life points.
